price: Estamo-lhes apressando as boas cousas? Não. Mas eles não percebem.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
